acceptance-test-run.title: when edit company, click cancel after fill all data
acceptance-test-run.name: when edit company, click cancel after fill all data

test-group.name: [1] {submenuText=Company Management, menuText=Common, filterText=CIJ, columnCompanyNameTitle=Company name, rowIndex=0, companyName=Test company}

test-step.description: When I open submenu Company Management of menu Common
And In Company management screen, I fill value 'CIJ' for filter in column 'Company name'
And In Company management screen, I select row '0'
And I edit company with name Test company

test-group.name: And I input company detail as below | companyFullName | workType | listed | headOffice | customerCode | branches | website | | Test company | 土木 | Type One | 岩手県 | z999 | 静岡県, 岡山県 | anlh2207@gmail.com |
